item.title: Where, oh where did my budget disappear to?
item.description: Nearing the end of the first quarter, many users begin adjusting their budgets and forecasts for the rest of the year. It’s common for users to accidentally delete or modify their budgets, so it’s important to review some guidelines for using budget windows in Microsoft Dynamics GP. Let’s start with the Budget Maintenance window, accessed through Cards»Financial»Budget, then choosing either Open»Using Microsoft Dynamics GP or New»Using Microsoft Dynamics GP. It’s crucial to remember that this window modifies the ENTIRE BUDGET unless a specific range is selected using the Ranges button.
